chara.textHome: Hm? Gonna have some summer fun today?

Stay cautious in the chem lab,
bold on the beach!
That's the kinda sexy scientist I wanna be!
Might go for a morning dip in the ocean...

Once it gets later in the day,
it gets crowded with couples and families.

The sun's high in the sky,
so make sure to block those UV rays.

I'm not coming up with a
Sunburn-B-Gone tonic anytime soon!

The chemistry club is like my own
private castle in the evening...
Especially during summer break.

Sometimes Emiri comes to visit,
that's about it.
Wha... Is it the middle of the night already?!
Well, I'll turn in after I study a bit more...

I won't set a good example for my juniors
if I slack off on homework.
Bleh, it's so hot...
I wanna go to my villa and cool down!
I call the school library my villa, by the way.
Time to get going.

No, not to the pool!
It's time to patrol for Witches!

We can't let ourselves get too soft
over the summer!
You wanna go to Endless Mirrors?

Maybe this heat will have worn out the
Magical Girl copies and make the fights
easier.
Heh heh heh...
Behold! My bold and bodacious swimsuit!

I'm basically a summer bombshell!
Pure coastal T-N-T!
I'm so excited to strut across the beach.

Cause this year, I've got 15 centimeters
of height raisi—
I mean, extra thick soled sandals!
Hey, what are you doing?!

How dare you splash me outta nowhere!
Do it again and I'll incinera—
I mean, blast you with my WATER cannon!

You can't just kid around when
you're in the ocean.
Witches might show up even at the beach...
And that's when I step in!

Could be fun to hold some kinda
"Fun Chemistry Experiment Event"
on the beach.

I mean, I bet lots of parents are here
with their kids.
I'm still so far off from my ideal body!
I can't wait until I manage to get there.

I only have so many summers of youth left,
ya know?!

I wanna sip a non-alcoholic cocktail
underneath a parasol on the beach...

Hey, quit tellin' me kids are
supposed to drink juice!

Emiri and Rika invited me to go to
the sea with them.

It'd be so embarrassing if people thought
I was their little sister. I'm older than them!
H-hey now! Quit pokin' my head!

Hold on...are you blushing looking
at my amazing body?
